title: Strategy, Schmategy
text: Roll a six-sided die for Strategy, Schmategy. On a 1, Strategy, Schmategy has no effect. Otherwise, it has one of the following effects.2 Destroy all artifacts.3 Destroy all lands.4 Strategy, Schmategy deals 3 damage to each creature and player.5 Each player discards his or her hand and draws seven cards. 6 Roll the die two more times.
